name: Kamikaze Warrior
description:
Look carefully, each boss has a weakness. Touch that weakness to harm the boss.
Dying will result in resurrection at the last checkpoint, use this to your advantage!

Use arrow keys or WASD for movement.

Press A or D or Left Arrow or Right Arrow to select option.

Link to github: https://github.com/Ripper53/KamikazeWarrior

Spoilers to the puzzles below!!!!!!!!!!!

  1. Somehow get the checkpoint on top of the giant's head, good luck! Then use the checkpoint to get the weary hit on its head when it slams its left hand (your right).
  2. Try and give the eye a poke.
  3. Get the checkpoint circling over the boss. The weak spot involves the sword, take a look at when it's most vulnerable.  Once you find when it is, try to resurrect at the last checkpoint so you can hit the vulnerability.
